body_html:
@aselle greetings, which files are relevant to add float16 support for maxpool3d? Is it beginner-friendly?

Is it like adding

REGISTER_KERNEL_BUILDER(
    Name("MaxPool").Device(DEVICE_CPU).TypeConstraint<Eigen::half>("T"),
    MaxPoolingOp<CPUDevice, Eigen::half>);

but for MaxPool3D in /tensorflow/core/kernels/maxpooling_op.cc?
